titles: Come hang out with other coders!
We spent too much time on this site.
mainHero.subtitle: Join the Computer Club!
mainHero.description: Computer Club at TSS is a place where you can learn n' talk about topics related to Computer Science, Programming, Tech, or anything you want really. Come join our community by clicking the links below! **We have meetings on Fridays after school (room 221), so you can just drop by as well.**

info.title: Create something cool!
info.description: Are you already well-versed in coding? Want to take it further and build something? Join the **development** division, and we'll take you through how to create real-world applications & software!

info.title: Think outside of the box...
info.description: Do solving puzzles pique your interest more? Want to know how to design intricate and useful algorithms? Join us in the **competitive** division, and we will guide you through the world of competitive programming!

languages.title: Need help with coding?
languages.subtitle: We're here to help!
languages.description: We know coding can be tough sometimes, and we're here to help! Just hop in our weekly meetings, and we're sure we can clear up your questions. *Just keep in mind, we won't work on projects for you, but we can lend assistance when needed.*

items.name: C / C++
items.description: A low-level and general-purpose programming language that is ideal for developing firmware or portable applications.

items.name: Python
items.description: A high-level and general-purpose programming language often used to build websites and software, automate tasks, and conduct data analysis.

items.name: Java
items.description: A general-purpose, class-based, object-oriented programming language designed for having lesser implementation dependencies.

items.name: Typescript
items.description: A strongly typed, object oriented, compiled programming language that is a superset of JavaScript.

items.name: And others too!
items.description: Odds are, we'll be familiar with the problem that you're trying to solve. If not, we might be able to point you to where the solution might be :)
